description: Creates an Assistant and returns its ID

assistant_name.info: Name for the assistant being created

instructions.info: Instructions for the assistant, think of these as the system prompt.

model.info:
Model for the assistant.

Environment variables for provider credentials can be set with the Dotenv Component.

Models are supported via LiteLLM, see (https://docs.litellm.ai/docs/providers) for supported model names and env vars.

env_set.info: Dummy input to allow chaining with Dotenv Component.
